name: Yip's Adventure
description:
Yip's Adventure is a puzzle platformer game. 

The goal is simple; find the three keys to unlock the final door.

Yip is a curious fella who decided to climb to the top of a random ladder in the middle of a cyberpunk-esque city. When he finds a strange object, he gets trapped inside a never ending puzzle. The only way to escape is to find the three keys located throughout the map and take them to the final door.
